my_converter.title: My Converter
my_converter.description: A Node.js project for converting various file formats.

guidance.introduction: Perfect, MJ! Let’s build your Node.js project step by step, with a clean structure, dedicated src folder, and converter scripts. I’ll walk you through commands, folder tree, and example scripts so you can run everything smoothly.

steps.title: Folder Structure
steps.tree:
D:\mj-ahmad\my_converter
│   package.json
│   README.md
│
└───src
    │   index.js
    │
    ├───converters
    │       markdown_to_json_converter.js
    │       html_to_json_converter.js
    │       json_to_markdown_converter.js
    │       json_to_html_converter.js
    │
    └───utils
            file_utils.js

steps.title: Install Dependencies
notes: jsdom → Parse HTML into DOM for conversion

steps.title: Utility Script
Entry Point
steps.code:
console.log("Welcome to my_converter project!");
console.log("Use npm run md2json, html2json, json2md, or json2html to test converters.");

guidance.closing: ✅ Now you have a complete Node.js project with a clean structure, dedicated src folder, utility functions, and converter scripts. Would you like me to also create a PowerShell automation script that sets up this entire structure automatically in D:\mj-ahmad\my_converter so you don’t have to manually create folders and files?

overview.title: Quraner Fariwala
overview.subtitle: Research • Printing • Distribution of Holy Quran
overview.description: Quraner Fariwala is Bangladesh's premier institution dedicated to the research, printing, and global distribution of the Holy Quran. We combine heritage, scholarship, and technology to empower millions of Hifz students, orphans, and underserved learners worldwide.
overview.mission: To spread Quranic knowledge through scholarly research, premium printing, and inclusive distribution, ensuring every student has access to memorization-optimized editions of the Holy Quran.
goals: Print and distribute high-quality Qurans globally
Support educational initiatives and scholarships
Advance Quranic research methodologies
Build sustainable infrastructure for long-term impact
Foster unity and inclusivity across the Ummah
taglines: A Journey of Light: Global Revival of Qur'anic Access

research.collaborations: International network of Quranic scholars and institutions

technologies: Digital layout optimization for Hifz students

distribution.network: Global partnerships with educational institutions, mosques, and NGOs

donation_information.transparency_policy: All donations are tracked and reported with complete transparency. Regular updates on fund utilization are provided to donors.

Ramadhan-2026.title: Ramadhan-2026: Global Revival of Qur'anic Access
Ramadhan-2026.description: A campaign to print and distribute 40,000 high-quality Qurans during Ramadhan 2026, prioritizing orphaned learners and underserved Hifz centres across South Asia.
goals: Print 40,000 copies of the Holy Quran
Distribute to 10,000 prioritized learners
Engage donors through multi-currency sponsorships

Educational_Support_Programs.description: Scholarships and resources for Hifz students and educational institutions.

key_messages: Join Us in Spreading the Light of the Quran
Your Support Makes a Lasting Impact

donation_purposes: Printing and Distribution of Holy Quran

core_values.transparency: Commitment to open and honest communication in all endeavors
core_values.ethics: Upholding the highest ethical standards in personal and professional life
core_values.accountability: Taking responsibility for actions and decisions
core_values.inclusivity: Ensuring equal opportunities and access for all
core_values.innovation: Embracing creative solutions to address challenges

philosophy_and_values.personal_message: Through steadfast dedication, ethical values, and innovative approaches, I seek to create meaningful opportunities and inspire a future full of possibilities. I believe that education is the cornerstone of progress, and together we can build a brighter future for Bangladesh. I welcome every student and supporter to join this journey of transformation.

professional_profile.title: Visionary Leader, Social Worker, and Dedicated Citizen
professional_profile.summary: Md Jafor Ahmad stands as a symbol of dedication and transparency, maintaining the highest ethical standards throughout his life. He remains committed to becoming a trusted ally for communities, enabling impactful change through education and social empowerment.
professional_profile.introduction: Md Jafor Ahmad, widely known as MJ Ahmad, is a visionary leader, social worker, and dedicated citizen of Bangladesh. Driven by a profound belief in the transformative potential of education, technology, and inclusivity, Md Jafor Ahmad has devoted his life to inspiring change and empowering the next generation.

achievements.title: Social Service Initiatives
achievements.description: Since 2014, Md Jafor Ahmad has actively organized and led impactful social service projects, focusing on community development, education, and sustainability.

achievements.title: Educational Programs
achievements.description: Developed comprehensive educational programs focusing on technology, programming, and innovation to empower Bangladeshi youth with essential skills for the future.

achievements.title: Environmental Development
achievements.description: Led initiatives for sustainable environmental practices and climate action, particularly in the Cox's Bazar region.

achievements.title: Community Building
achievements.description: Created platforms for community engagement, mentorship, and knowledge sharing to foster collaboration and growth.

vision.mission_statement: To empower Bangladeshi communities through education, technology, and sustainable development initiatives that create lasting positive change and opportunities for future generations.
long_term_goals: Establish Bangladesh as a hub for technological innovation and education in South Asia
Create sustainable educational models that can be replicated across developing nations
Build a network of empowered communities that drive their own development
Foster a culture of ethical leadership and transparent governance
Develop technology solutions that address critical local challenges

impact_areas.education: Transforming educational access and quality through technology and innovative teaching methods
impact_areas.technology: Building technological capacity and digital literacy across Bangladesh
impact_areas.environment: Promoting sustainable practices and climate resilience, particularly in vulnerable coastal areas
impact_areas.community_development: Empowering communities to lead their own development initiatives
impact_areas.leadership: Nurturing the next generation of ethical, innovative leaders

overview.title: Quraner Fariwala
overview.subtitle: Research • Printing • Distribution of Holy Quran
overview.description: Quraner Fariwala is Bangladesh's premier institution dedicated to the research, printing, and global distribution of the Holy Quran. We combine heritage, scholarship, and technology to empower millions of Hifz students, orphans, and underserved learners worldwide.
overview.mission: To spread Quranic knowledge through scholarly research, premium printing, and inclusive distribution, ensuring every student has access to memorization-optimized editions of the Holy Quran.
goals: Print and distribute high-quality Qurans globally
Support educational initiatives and scholarships
Advance Quranic research methodologies
Build sustainable infrastructure for long-term impact
Foster unity and inclusivity across the Ummah
taglines: A Journey of Light: Global Revival of Qur'anic Access

research.collaborations: International network of Quranic scholars and institutions

technologies: Digital layout optimization for Hifz students

distribution.network: Global partnerships with educational institutions, mosques, and NGOs

Ramadhan-2026.title: Ramadhan-2026: Global Revival of Qur'anic Access
Ramadhan-2026.description: A campaign to print and distribute 40,000 high-quality Qurans during Ramadhan 2026, prioritizing orphaned learners and underserved Hifz centres across South Asia.
goals: Print 40,000 copies of the Holy Quran
Distribute to 10,000 prioritized learners
Engage donors through multi-currency sponsorships

core_values.transparency: Commitment to open and honest communication in all endeavors
core_values.ethics: Upholding the highest ethical standards in personal and professional life
core_values.accountability: Taking responsibility for actions and decisions
core_values.inclusivity: Ensuring equal opportunities and access for all
core_values.innovation: Embracing creative solutions to address challenges

philosophy_and_values.personal_message: Through steadfast dedication, ethical values, and innovative approaches, I seek to create meaningful opportunities and inspire a future full of possibilities. I believe that education is the cornerstone of progress, and together we can build a brighter future for Bangladesh. I welcome every student and supporter to join this journey of transformation.

contact.for_urgent_matters: For urgent matters related to ongoing projects or support, please include 'URGENT' in the email subject line.

professional_profile.title: Visionary Leader, Social Worker, and Dedicated Citizen
professional_profile.summary: Md Jafor Ahmad stands as a symbol of dedication and transparency, maintaining the highest ethical standards throughout his life. He remains committed to becoming a trusted ally for communities, enabling impactful change through education and social empowerment.
professional_profile.introduction: Md Jafor Ahmad, widely known as MJ Ahmad, is a visionary leader, social worker, and dedicated citizen of Bangladesh. Driven by a profound belief in the transformative potential of education, technology, and inclusivity, Md Jafor Ahmad has devoted his life to inspiring change and empowering the next generation.

achievements.title: Social Service Initiatives
achievements.description: Since 2014, Md Jafor Ahmad has actively organized and led impactful social service projects, focusing on community development, education, and sustainability.

achievements.title: Educational Programs
achievements.description: Developed comprehensive educational programs focusing on technology, programming, and innovation to empower Bangladeshi youth with essential skills for the future.

achievements.title: Environmental Development
achievements.description: Led initiatives for sustainable environmental practices and climate action, particularly in the Cox's Bazar region.

achievements.title: Community Building
achievements.description: Created platforms for community engagement, mentorship, and knowledge sharing to foster collaboration and growth.

vision.mission_statement: To empower Bangladeshi communities through education, technology, and sustainable development initiatives that create lasting positive change and opportunities for future generations.
long_term_goals: Establish Bangladesh as a hub for technological innovation and education in South Asia
Create sustainable educational models that can be replicated across developing nations
Build a network of empowered communities that drive their own development
Foster a culture of ethical leadership and transparent governance
Develop technology solutions that address critical local challenges

impact_areas.education: Transforming educational access and quality through technology and innovative teaching methods
impact_areas.technology: Building technological capacity and digital literacy across Bangladesh
impact_areas.environment: Promoting sustainable practices and climate resilience, particularly in vulnerable coastal areas
impact_areas.community_development: Empowering communities to lead their own development initiatives
impact_areas.leadership: Nurturing the next generation of ethical, innovative leaders

Yunus_Inspire.description: Project aimed at empowering Bangladeshi youth through education, technology, and ethical practices, inspired by Nobel Laureate Professor Muhammad Yunus.
Yunus_Inspire.mission: To inspire and enable Bangladeshi students by providing free, accessible, and innovative resources in technology and programming.
Yunus_Inspire.current_status: In development phase, seeking funding and partnerships

Trusted_Ally.description: Community development platform focused on education and long-term development.
Trusted_Ally.mission: To serve as a trusted intermediary connecting communities with resources, expertise, and support systems needed for sustainable development.
Trusted_Ally.current_status: Operational with limited resources, seeking expansion funding

my_converter.title: My Converter
my_converter.description: A Node.js project for converting various file formats.

guidance.introduction: Perfect, MJ! Let’s build your Node.js project step by step, with a clean structure, dedicated src folder, and converter scripts. I’ll walk you through commands, folder tree, and example scripts so you can run everything smoothly.

steps.title: Folder Structure
steps.tree:
D:\mj-ahmad\my_converter
│   package.json
│   README.md
│
└───src
    │   index.js
    │
    ├───converters
    │       markdown_to_json_converter.js
    │       html_to_json_converter.js
    │       json_to_markdown_converter.js
    │       json_to_html_converter.js
    │
    └───utils
            file_utils.js

steps.title: Install Dependencies
notes: jsdom → Parse HTML into DOM for conversion

steps.title: Utility Script
Entry Point
steps.code:
console.log("Welcome to my_converter project!");
console.log("Use npm run md2json, html2json, json2md, or json2html to test converters.");

guidance.closing: ✅ Now you have a complete Node.js project with a clean structure, dedicated src folder, utility functions, and converter scripts. Would you like me to also create a PowerShell automation script that sets up this entire structure automatically in D:\mj-ahmad\my_converter so you don’t have to manually create folders and files?
